Articles.Content:
Little Teenaged HarvestR launched some rockets. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/8995-I-have-found-it!!-THE-ORIGINAL-KERBO-LOG!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

YouTube link to the launch and recovery is in the descriptions of the first and second images.

I put Bill and Bob (two toy plastic astronauts) in a firework rocket and launched them into SPAAAAACE! Unfortunately the ship exploded before it got to the point where the fuel ran out too early. Clearly it was a bad idea to use a firework rocket.
I will be doing more launches and documenting them. I am going to try to put two fireworks together and see how that works.
